inicio.bio: I'm Amanda, a freelancer who loves taking on challenges and is always looking for new things. With sharp skills and a creative mind, I'm here to help you with customized solutions and incredible results for your project.

sobre.p: My team and I are dedicated to providing high-quality services that meet the specific needs of each client. With a talented and diverse team, we offer expertise in front-end development, graphic design, video editing and digital marketing.
xpInfo: Throughout my journey at Workana, I've had the opportunity to collaborate with different clients and projects, developing innovative and personalized solutions. The platform has allowed me to expand my portfolio, working in areas such as frontend, graphic design, video editing and digital marketing. Each experience has helped me hone my skills and deliver exceptional results that have exceeded client expectations.

My experience at Upwork has been marked by international collaborations that have enriched my professional perspective. I've worked with clients from different parts of the world, offering creative and technical solutions in frontend, graphic design, video editing and digital marketing. The diversity of projects and the demand for high quality have pushed me to continuously improve and deliver work that makes a difference.
sobre.altPic: Photo of Amanda Caleiras in passport format
